reviews.review: 作弊 透視 太多官方沒作為

CSGOs anti-cheat is weak. an external anti-cheat like face-it would be much better.
My trust factor is pretty high and im still stuck with obvious cheaters every second game.
Убожество, как и игра так и люди играющие в неё

Echt Spannendes Spiel! Viele Möglichkeiten wie z.b Leute Kennen zulernen und einfach nur Spaß zu haben reicht das Spiel vollkommen aus. Aber an manchen Punkten stört mich schon was, das z.B Cheaters unterwegs sind und das Spielspaß stören. Aber sonnst so, finde ich dass, das Spiel sehr Erfolgreich ist und vielleicht wird man selber Erfolgreich durch Training  & Turniere mit diesem Spiel.
PS: Hervorragendes Spiel ( EMPFEHLENSWERT )
amo esse jogo com todas minhas forsas
Très bien pour s'entrainer en visée , strategie etc
Polecam innym użytkownikom, gra bardzo fajna, jednak brakuje mi w niej jedynie samouczka na sam początek, jednak sama rozgrywka jest bardzo interesujaca
I first played this game 5 years ago and I still like it:) only problem I see is cheaters, steam rly needs to work on their anti cheat here:(

Anlatmaya gerek yok görüyorsunuz yılların favorisi olan bu oyun her oyuncunun rafında bulunması gereken oyunlardan bir tanesidir. Seçkin hesap tavsiyemdir en azında hileler hatta (kolsuzlar) olarak bildiğimiz bu canlıların bir nebze de olsa rahat bırakacaktır sizi!!!

Now ive been playing this game almost 6 years and got a lot of hours in this game. Now i took a break for this game for a about year and the reason for that was because of 1 cheaters 2 toxic 3 people deranking i mange to get to mg2 before i stop and i come back and its worst now i went from nova to sliver and maybe some might ask wait what about FACEIT well let me tell you i join a faceit game and this game was telling everyone he deranking so yeah and what about a 5MAN well not many of my friends play csgo at least not anymore so thats out too so how the FUCK AM I GONNA GET BETTER IF THIS SHIT KEEP HAPPENING TOO ME my win rate is 40% LIKE wtf so fuck this game i gave it the hours the time the effort and i got nothing to show for it so if anyone know what im talking please fucking GOD HELP!
